snippet.title: Trailer Architect
snippet.description:
ARCHITECT,  2019

Architect is a VR puzzle game in which you embody a student in architecture whose goal is to bring out a silhouette of a construction by creating a path of light using modules such as doors, stairs, balcony, elevators, etc ...

An Enjmin student project (Unity)
A 3 month VR project with a 6 people team

Producer: Louis Le Gacq
Programming: Alfred Brisac
Artist: Mélusine Wagner
Sound designer: Corentin Lavergne
UX designer: Charles Chantriaux
Game & Level designer: Ronan Houzé
